name: gemini-skills
description: Provides several skills powered by Google Gemini: video-understanding (supporting local files and YouTube links), audio-understanding (supporting local files and YouTube links), image-generation (using Nano Banana Pro), video-generation (using Veo 3.1), text-to-speech (with 30 voices and 24 languages), and gemini-consultation (to get a second opinion from another frontier AI).
